text:
In Apache Web Server it is possible to restrict access to a servlet to a list 
of IP addresses or range of addresses (subnet). I'm hoping that you will 
consider implementing this functionality into the Tomcat Web server.
creator: jemiller@uchicago.edu
craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
This is possible when running Tomcat standalone, by using one of the
standard request filter valves included with Tomcat 4.0.  See the section
on "Request Filters" on the configuration page for the <Engine>, <Host>, or
<Context> elements, in the "Server Configuration" documentation that comes
with Tomcat 4.0 (with a standard install, available at)

http://localhost:8080/docs/config/index.html
